articles.description: George Kliavkoff says he told Brett Yormark that "college athletics is healthier" when the Pac-12 and Big 12 are "vibrant."
articles.content: LOS ANGELES It’s been about a month since the news that USC and UCLA are bolting for the Big Ten, and the disappointment and anger toward the two L.A. schools from inside the Pac-12 haven’t eased up … [+8384 chars]
